src_original: Pratītyasamutpādahṛdayakārikā (Pshk)  nāgārjunakṛtā  dvādaśa ye 'ṅgaviśeṣā muninoddiṣṭāḥ pratītyasambhūtāḥ /
tgt_original: 牟尼所演說，　　十二勝上分， 因緣所生法，　　彼為三所攝。
煩惱業及苦，　　次說應當知，

src_original: ādyāṣṭamanavamāḥ syuḥ kleśāḥ karma dvitīyadaśamau ca /
tgt_original: 煩惱初八九，　　業二及以十，

src_original: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkhaṃ trisaṅgrahā dvādaśa tu dharmāḥ // Pshk_2 //
tgt_original: 餘七說為苦，　　三攝十二法，

src_original: tribhyo bhavati dvandvaṃ dvandvātprabhavanti sapta saptabhyaḥ /  traya udbhavanti bhūyastadeva[tu] bhramati bhavacakram // Pshk_3 //
tgt_original: 從三故生二，　　從二故生七， 從七復生三，　　是故如輪轉。
一切世間法，　　唯因果無人，

src_original: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ // Pshk_4 //
tgt_original: 但從諸空法，　　唯生於空法。
